refnamediv.refpurpose: Unwrap radian phases by adding or subtracting multiples of 2*pi.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: B = unwrap(X) B = unwrap(X, TOL) B = unwrap(X, TOL, DIM)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function unwraps radian phases by adding or subtracting multiples of 2*pi as appropriate to remove jumps greater than TOL.
Unwrap will work along the dimension DIM. If DIM is unspecified it defaults to the first non-singleton dimension.
